dcterms:creator: Aitor Gonzalez-Agirre
Montserrat Marimon
Ander Intxaurrondo
Obdulia Rabal
Marta Villegas
Martin Krallinger
dcterms:description: A collection of clinical case report sections derived from open access Spanish medical publications, containing a total of 1,000 clinical cases and 396,988 words, manually annotated with 7,624 entity mentions.
dcterms:title: Spanish Clinical Case Corpus (SPACCC)

dcterms:creator: A Miranda-Escalada
E Farré
M Krallinger
dcterms:description: A collection of 1,301 oncological case reports written in Spanish, with a total of 63,016 sentences and 1,093,501 tokens, focusing on named entity recognition of tumor morphology.
dcterms:title: CANTEMIST corpus

dcterms:creator: A Miranda-Escalada
E Farré
M Krallinger
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 1,006 hospital discharge reports of patients admitted for stroke from 18 different Spanish hospitals, containing over 79,000 annotations for 51 different kinds of variables.
dcterms:title: ICTUSnet dataset
